title: World Turtle Day
description: Around the world turtles are celebrated just for one special day and today is that day! Get in the World Turtle Day spirit by seeing all these great Simply Southern turtle themed items!

title: Rizzy Home's Deal of the Week 11/21/2018 to 11/28/2018
alt: Deal of the Week for Rizzy Home the week of 11/21/2018 to 11/28/2018
description: Deal of the Week featuring various rugs on clearance for that week for buisnesses to buy.

title: First Day of Fall
alt: Rizzy Home's Whittier rug along with wording saying 'Happy First Day of Fall' with a fall leaf.
description: There are many reasons to love Fall and one should be the Whittier rug by Rizzy Home!

title: Christmas Eve
alt: Snowflakes and a red background with 'Merry Christmas Eve from Rizzy Home'
description: It is almost time for the best day of the year! Rizzy Home hopes you have a great Christmas Eve!
